ul.li: The booke of five collumnes of architecture, called Tuscan, Dorica, Ionica, Corinthia, and Composita [microform] : drawne and counterfeited after the right symmetry and cunning measure of free-masons / gathered ... by Hans Bloome, out of antiquities, for the benefite of free-masons, carpenters, goldsmithes, painters, carvers, in-layers, anticke-cutters, and all other that delight to practice with the compasse and square ; translated out of Latine into English by J.T.
